title: POtHS - End Times - 56 - The Antichrist and His Kingdom

UNveiling The Man of Sin with Dr. Joe VanKoevering 2005:
There is ONLY ONE MAN on the world scene today who meets ALL the scriptural qualifications of the Man of Sin... the Antichrist, and Barack Obama is not him. Unveiling the Man of Sin explores Dr. VanKoevering's research into who this man is and his role in the world scene!

Note from EternalRhythmFlow:

In light of the unbiblical, uneducated and ridiculously sensational "Obama is the Antichrist" internet craze which no prophecy teacher worth his salt believes, I want to encourage my educated viewers to study the biblical facts about the Antichrist's scriptural qualifications. I think you will be amazed at what Dr. VanKoevering has put together. Food for thought. Thanks for watching. Enjoy!

REVELATION ABOUT THE PESTILENCE AND THE PUNISHMENT FROM GOD UPON THE CHURCH AS A RESULT OF SIN:
The LORD GOD Almighty; though He is the God of Mercy; He is also the GOD of Judgment and Wrath: Jdg 10:7 And the anger of the LORD was hot against Israel, and he sold them into the hands of the Philistines, and into the hands of the children of Ammon.
He still punishes when we sin against Him. He still brings calamity, desolation and disaster when His people and the church disobey Him. WHY? BECAUSE THE BIBLE SAYS THAT SIN WILL NOT GO UNPUNISHED: (Jer_25:29 For, lo, I begin to bring evil on the city which is called by my name, and should ye be utterly unpunished? Ye shall not be unpunished: for I will call for a sword upon all the inhabitants of the earth, saith the LORD of hosts.
Rom 2:8 But unto them that are contentious, and do not obey the truth, but obey unrighteousness, indignation and wrath, Rom 2:9 Tribulation and anguish, upon every soul of man that doeth evil, of the Jew first, and also of the Gentile;
Pro_11:21 Though hand join in hand, the wicked shall not be unpunished: but the seed of the righteous shall be delivered.)
David has sinned against God by numbering the people of Israel without God's instructions. The LORD came to Him and asked Him to choose three things: 7 years famine; 3 months of attack and dominion by His enemies or three days of pestilence in the Land?? David being wise chose to fall in the Hands of God in who are mercies in great abundance.

CONSEQUENCES OF THE SIN COMMITTED BY THE CHURCH

Jdg_2:14 And the anger of the LORD was hot against Israel, and he delivered them into the hands of spoilers that spoiled them, and he sold them into the hands of their enemies round about, so that they could not any longer stand before their enemies.

1. GOD handed the present Church to False Prophets, false Pastors and false evangelist

Jdg 3:8 Therefore the anger of the LORD was hot against Israel, and he sold them into the hand of Chushanrishathaim king of Mesopotamia: and the children of Israel served Chushanrishathaim eight years.

Isa 50:1 Thus saith the LORD, Where is the bill of your mother's divorcement, whom I have put away? or which of my creditors is it to whom I have sold you? Behold, for your iniquities have ye sold yourselves, and for your transgressions is your mother put away.
5. The rise of multitude of prosperity and mammon lover preachers in the Church is the greatest sign of God's pestilence against this prostitute spouse of GOD(the fallen Church)

Amo 8:11 Behold, the days come, saith the Lord GOD, that I will send a famine in the land, not a famine of bread, nor a thirst for water, but of hearing the words of the LORD:
Amo 8:12 And they shall wander from sea to sea, and from the north even to the east, they shall run to and fro to seek the word of the LORD, and shall not find it.

8. The Nations of the world are today suffering this turbulence in the whole world because of the Church which has decided to prostitute against her Husband- GOD the Father

WE FOUND THE NEPHILIM:
L.A. Marzulli presents some evidence on "It's Supernatural" with Sid Roth.  Order the Book & 2-DVD set by L.A. Marzulli:

This week on Sid Roth's It's Supernatural, L.A. Marzulli has long searched for physical evidence of the Nephilim, the giants of the Bible.  A significant cover-up over the years moved these hybrid humans to the dustbins of history.  But now evidence has been found in Peru and the U.S.A.!

Victoria, Nigeria - IDOP 2013:
This 5-minute IDOP video focuses on Victoria and Rejoice, two teenage girls who live in Gombe, Nigeria. One day as the girls worshiped at the Deeper Life Church, they came under attack from radical Muslims. Both girls lost family members.

Believers like Victoria and Rejoice need our prayers. To encourage more prayer for the persecuted, this year VOM is offering our 2013 IDOP video for free. Please share the DVD with your pastor, and ask him to share it with your church on Nov. 3, the International Day of Prayer for the Persecuted Church. Please also share it with your family, friends and Sunday school class. We want believers to know what is happening to our brothers and sisters in Nigeria so they can join us in prayer for them.

Go to http://www.icommittopray.com to show your commitment to pray for the persecuted church and begin to receive weekly prayer updates when the full site launches on Nov. 3.
